AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Responsible
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the most responsible child [PAWN_possessive] large, bustling family. [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn how to watch over [PAWN_possessive] siblings while [PAWN_possessive] parents were busy working. [PAWN_pronoun] learned a lot, but developed a stern exterior.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the quietest child in [PAWN_possessive] large, bustling family. In order to escape from the chaos, [PAWN_pronoun] often sneaked out of the city and spent time in the forests around it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Urban Scavenger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed climbing through the parts of the city where people threw out their junk. [PAWN_pronoun] knew that [PAWN_pronoun] could make their trash into [PAWN_possessive] treasure.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pampered Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In [PAWN_nameDef]'s home, every one of [PAWN_possessive] whims were catered to. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed this life, but it didn't prepare [PAWN_pronoun] for the harshness of the world. At least [PAWN_possessive] parents occasionaly took [PAWN_pronoun] to the archery range.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: entertainment
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a poor child and needed to make money somehow. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to perform on the side of the road for the entertainment of passerby. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't make a ton of money, but [PAWN_pronoun] made enough to survive.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: war survivor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s home was set ablaze during great battle. [PAWN_possessive] parents didn't make it out alive, so [PAWN_pronoun] had to build a shelter for [PAWN_possessive] brothers and sisters to survive in.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: urchin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] never knew [PAWN_possessive] parents, but [PAWN_pronoun] didn't care. [PAWN_pronoun] made [PAWN_possessive] living stealing from others, fighting out of scraps, and talking [PAWN_possessive] way out of conflict.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Industrious Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s home city was rife with shortages and war, which meant that all pairs of able hands were needed to produce things. As soon as [PAWN_nameDef] could hold a hammer, [PAWN_pronoun] was put to work. There was no room for creativity in [PAWN_possessive] work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Abadar Deacon
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was orphaned as a child. They wandered to a chapel of Abadar, where [PAWN_pronoun] was taken in and raised by the clerics there. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the importance of order and understanding.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Art Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] was taken to a church of Shelyn where they recognized [PAWN_possessive] natural beauty and took [PAWN_pronoun] in. [PAWN_pronoun] was exposed to constant praise, treated like a piece of art while also being taught to make art themselves.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Free Thinker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a couple of Desna worshipers. They eagerly taught [PAWN_possessive] the ways of their church, encouraging free thinking and travel.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child of War
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a desperate orphan, [PAWN_nameDef] was taken in by a group of mercenaries who worshiped Gorum. They taught [PAWN_possessive] the importance of faith demonstrated by strength.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bartender
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] learned that [PAWN_pronoun] had a knack for talking with people and that [PAWN_pronoun] had particular interest in ale. In [PAWN_possessive] adulthood, [PAWN_pronoun] opened up [PAWN_possessive] own bar. [PAWN_pronoun] even brewed [PAWN_possessive] own ale!

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: town guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Whether out of need for a job or out of love for [PAWN_possessive] community, [PAWN_nameDef] became a town guard. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to effectively arrest people, as well as talk to criminals through their crimes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Biography Author
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] deciced to write a number of books about [PAWN_possessive] life experiences. [PAWN_pronoun] found moderate success, but not before countless sleepless nights of hard work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Nature Author
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was inspired to write a survival guide about [PAWN_possessive] homeland. [PAWN_pronoun] spent lots of time researching the local wildlife and plants, and [PAWN_pronoun] took careful notes on what was edible or not.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Baker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In rising loaves and mixing spices, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_possessive] passion. [PAWN_pronoun] opened up a small bakery to share [PAWN_possessive] crafts and quickly learned that the true joy of [PAWN_possessive] work came from seeing the satisfied look on [PAWN_possessive] customer's faces.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] purchased a farm on the outskirts of town. [PAWN_possessive] life was a simple one, as [PAWN_pronoun] took care of crops and animals while scaring away the occasional animal or raider.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed working with metal, and decided to turn it into [PAWN_possessive] livelihood. [PAWN_pronoun] would regularly visit mines to source [PAWN_possessive] materials, and enjoyed practicing with [PAWN_possessive] latest masterpiece.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Alchemist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] stumbled upon the art of alchemy, and decided to open up an apothecary. Using [PAWN_possessive] new talents, [PAWN_possessive] provided extracts and serums to soothe their city's woes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Drunkard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Life was good for [PAWN_nameDef] until they had their first sip of ale. They were unable to stop, and found [PAWN_objective]self in the tavern more than anywhere else. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to hold [PAWN_possessive] own in a bar fight, as well as keep up with drunken songs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Scholar
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Having grown up around books, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_possessive] way into an academy. [PAWN_pronoun] graduated with ease, but not without learning to defend [PAWN_objective]self from bullies.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Servant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a servant under a city noble. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the intricacies of nobility. It was also necessary for [PAWN_objective] to gain a tough skin, as [PAWN_pronoun] had to put up with the noble's stuck up children.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Early Art Obsession
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by gnomes who encouraged [PAWN_possessive] creativity and uniqueness. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly developed a specific obsession with art.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Early Craft Obsession
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by industrius gnomes who supported [PAWN_possessive] tinkering and production. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly developed a specific obsession with craft.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Early Invention Obsession
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by studious gnomes who reinforced [PAWN_possessive] wild ideas and plans. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly developed a specific obsession with inventing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Artistic Genius
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s obsession with art never truly went away. [PAWN_pronoun] honed [PAWN_possessive] craft for years, becoming the best around! Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] didn't learn to do much else.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Crafting Genius
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s obsession with crafting never truly went away. [PAWN_pronoun] honed [PAWN_possessive] craft for years, becoming the best around! Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] didn't learn to do much else.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Genius Inventor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s obsession with inventing never truly went away. [PAWN_pronoun] honed [PAWN_possessive] craft for years, becoming the best around! Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] didn't learn to do much else. Their ramblings are so incoherent that it bothers others, too.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Raised in a City
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken in and raised by civilized folks in the city when [PAWN_pronoun] was only a child. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the ways of proper behavior, and shunned the tribal ways of others of [PAWN_possessive] kind.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pit Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] never knew [PAWN_possessive] parents, only that [PAWN_pronoun] was meant to fight. Chosen for [PAWN_possessive] natural strength, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to fight for the entertainment of others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pit Fighter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up around violence and blood. [PAWN_pronoun] never learned to relate to people, as [PAWN_pronoun] was far too busy figuring out their weakness. One day, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to fight [PAWN_possessive] way out of the fighting pits, but didn't know where to go after that.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Homeless Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on the streets for as long as [PAWN_pronoun] can remember. [PAWN_pronoun] learned some tricks to survive.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ex Tribe Member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised with orcish tribes, but one day got lost when [PAWN_pronoun] was little. When [PAWN_pronoun] was rescued by civilized humans, [PAWN_pronoun] followed them without looking back on [PAWN_possessive] old life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hauler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Revered for [PAWN_possessive] strength, [PAWN_nameDef] was hired for many different construction and mining projects. [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive] pulling carts full of materials regularly, and got incredibly fit from it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Performer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Due to being an orc, [PAWN_nameDef] got lots of attention, and [PAWN_pronoun] quickly learned that [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed it. [PAWN_pronoun] sought out to hone [PAWN_possessive] skills to get as much attention as possible!

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bloodrager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and bred for war, and [PAWN_pronoun] became a paragon of it. Nearby villages grew to fear the sound of [PAWN_possessive] roar. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to relish in the feeling of burning down buildings.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Witness
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s childhood was ordinary for an orc until [PAWN_pronoun] witnessed a tribesmate kill the chieftan. The tribesmate threatened that they would do worse than kill [PAWN_nameDef] if [PAWN_pronoun] spoke about it to anyone. [PAWN_pronoun] never spoke again, but trained quietly in secret.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tribe Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised in the orcish tribes. They participated in training, rituals, and every other facet of tribe life. [PAWN_pronoun] was often in charge of taking care of livestock.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Field Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up around the stories of great orc heroes told around the campfire. [PAWN_pronoun] did [PAWN_possessive] best to emulate the storied heroes by chasing wild animals away from the growing field with [PAWN_possessive] sling.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child of the Chief
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to one of the chiefs of [PAWN_possessive] tribe, which meant that [PAWN_pronoun] had the chance to become a chief one day. [PAWN_pronoun] had to work extra hard to prove that [PAWN_pronoun] was worthy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Aspiring Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] watched the hunters haul back dead beasts to feed the tribe, and [PAWN_pronoun] believed that [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to do the same when [PAWN_pronoun] was older. [PAWN_pronoun] did [PAWN_possessive] best to practice, even if [PAWN_pronoun] only had access to a small bow.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Greedy Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] cared more about food than anything else. [PAWN_pronoun] would sneak by the bonfire to steal more than [PAWN_pronoun] was supposed to have. Often [PAWN_pronoun] would be caught by the cook, and be forced to help.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] showed promise with hunting as a child, and was given the opportunity to provide food for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't disappoint.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Grower
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found that they had a knack for plants, and decided to start growing them. Before long, [PAWN_possessive] little farm plot became a vital source of food for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] spent lots of time digging out areas to expand [PAWN_possessive] farm.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Builder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: When it was time for [PAWN_nameDef] to build [PAWN_possessive] own hut, [PAWN_pronoun] ended up doing a great job. Other tribesmates relied on [PAWN_possessive] insights for all future construction projects.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Runt
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Try as [PAWN_pronoun] might, [PAWN_nameDef] was the least likely to become a chief among their current offspring. [PAWN_pronoun] became bitter, but decided to focus [PAWN_possessive] efforts elsewhere.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chieftan
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was able to prove [PAWN_possessive] strength, courage, and cunning, thus were chosen by the seer to become a new chieftan. Due to ancient tradition, [PAWN_nameDef] is not allowed to do menial labor around the camp.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Seer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] began having odd dreams, and soon realized that they pertained to the future. Trained by their tribe seer, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to channel their divination. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned about various tonics and treatments for common ailments.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Broodchild
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born among many other young goblins, and quickly learned to be as rambunctious and careless as possible. [PAWN_pronoun] loved throwing rocks and chasing animals as much as any other goblin.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fire Lover
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] discovered that fire was [PAWN_possessive] best friend, and wanted to share their friendship with the world!

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mold Eater
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent lots of time crawling under moldy logs to see what kind of fun things there were to eat. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the hard way what kinds of plants are poisonous, which ones are safe, and which ones make other goblins barf.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beast Chaser
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved to chase dogs. When [PAWN_pronoun] finally caught up with one, [PAWN_pronoun] didn't know what to do. [PAWN_nameDef] simply decided that [PAWN_pronoun] a friend to dogs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Word Hater
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] knows that reading steals words from your brain, and [PAWN_pronoun] has dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to anything that doesn't require looking at words.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Goblin Bully
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was laughed at by fellow goblins when [PAWN_pronoun] fell face-first into a puddle of mud. [PAWN_nameDef] got [PAWN_possessive] revenge by beating up the other goblins. [PAWN_pronoun] decided that [PAWN_pronoun] would always be the one to get the first (and last) laugh from now on.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bullied
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was bullied often. [PAWN_pronoun] took out their anger on dolls [PAWN_pronoun] had made to represent [PAWN_possessive] biggest enemies. Crafting them was fun, but destroying them was the funnest part.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: ugly freak
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is uglier than your average goblin, and [PAWN_pronoun] wears it as a badge of honor. [PAWN_possessive] eager ugliness is bad enough to give them a combat advantage.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: stone thrower
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] would toss rocks at things all day long. They would pelt rocks, trees, bugs, and even fellow goblins with carefully chosen stones. They ended up getting pretty accurate.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: competent crafter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was relied on by [PAWN_possessive] fellow goblins for [PAWN_possessive] crafting skills. [PAWN_pronoun] still bullied for not being strong, and could only mutter disdainfully about it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Nature Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent much of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in the wild, preferring the company of the plants and animals [PAWN_pronoun] encountered. [PAWN_pronoun] would get lost in thought for hours as [PAWN_pronoun] identified the animals around [PAWN_possessive].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Librarian's Assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind was good at organizing things, which made [PAWN_objective] a fantastic assistant to a stern librarian. [PAWN_pronoun] spent lots of time memorizing where books where kept in the great elven library, and would read them in [PAWN_possessive] spare time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elven Trainee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a part of the forest that was under threat of constant attack. In order to defend it, [PAWN_pronoun] was trained in the arts of bowmanship at a young age.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: warrior's apprentice
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised and trained by a wise old dwarf in the way of combat.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: mountain climber
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed climbing mountains, but once got themselves stuck in a dirt hole They ended up having to tunnel their way out.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: dwarven blacksmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] became a blacksmith just like [PAWN_possessive] father, and [PAWN_possessive] father's father.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found their passion in the swing of [PAWN_possessive] pickaxe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: alesmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] brewed ales for the dwarves of [PAWN_possessive] tunnel home. [PAWN_possessive] services were in high demand.
